multidplyr
part of the tidyverse 0.0.0.9000

Cluster utitility functions

Source: R/cluster-utils.R
cluster_utils.Rd

These functions provide useful helpers for performaning common operations.

cluster_assign(cluster, name, expr)

cluster_assign_each(cluster, name, values)

cluster_copy(cluster, names, env = caller_env())

cluster_get(cluster, name)

cluster_rm(cluster, names)

cluster_ls(cluster)

cluster_library(cluster, packages)

Arguments

cluster

Cluster to work on
name, names

Name of variable or variables, as strings.
expr

An expression to evaluate.
values

A list of values, one for each worker.
env

Environment in which to look for varibles to copy.
packages

Character vector of packages to load

Value

All functions that modify the worker environment invisibly return the cluster so they can chain them together. The other functions return lists with with one element for each worker.

Examples

cl <- new_cluster(2)
cl %>%
  cluster_assign("x", runif(1)) %>%
  cluster_get("x")
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.9167678
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.2200362
#> 

# Inline the expression using !! if you want to compute it locally
cl %>%
  cluster_assign("y", !!runif(1)) %>%
  cluster_get("x")
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.9167678
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.2200362
#> 

cl %>%
  cluster_assign_each("z", list(3, 4)) %>%
  cluster_get("z")
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 3
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 4
#> 

cl %>% cluster_ls()
#> [[1]]
#> [1] "data" "env"  "x"    "y"    "z"   
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] "data" "env"  "x"    "y"    "z"   
#> 

w <- 10
cluster_copy(cl, "w")

cl %>% cluster_rm(c("w", "x", "y", "z"))
cl %>% cluster_ls()
#> [[1]]
#> [1] "data" "env" 
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] "data" "env" 
#> 

cl %>% cluster_call(search())
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] ".GlobalEnv"        "package:stats"     "package:graphics" 
#>  [4] "package:grDevices" "package:utils"     "package:datasets" 
#>  [7] "package:methods"   "Autoloads"         "tools:callr"      
#> [10] "package:base"     
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] ".GlobalEnv"        "package:stats"     "package:graphics" 
#>  [4] "package:grDevices" "package:utils"     "package:datasets" 
#>  [7] "package:methods"   "Autoloads"         "tools:callr"      
#> [10] "package:base"     
#> 

cl %>%
  cluster_library("magrittr") %>%
  cluster_call(search())
#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘magrittr’
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:testthat’:
#> 
#>     equals, is_less_than, not
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] ".GlobalEnv"        "package:magrittr"  "package:stats"    
#>  [4] "package:graphics"  "package:grDevices" "package:utils"    
#>  [7] "package:datasets"  "package:methods"   "Autoloads"        
#> [10] "tools:callr"       "package:base"     
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] ".GlobalEnv"        "package:magrittr"  "package:stats"    
#>  [4] "package:graphics"  "package:grDevices" "package:utils"    
#>  [7] "package:datasets"  "package:methods"   "Autoloads"        
#> [10] "tools:callr"       "package:base"     
#>
